price: (49) And of all things We created two mates [i.e., counterparts]; perhaps you will remember.
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
